Home » 13S3 Khandhavaggasaṃyuttapāḷi » 12 Vacchagottasaṃyutta » 12.1 Vacchagottavagga
12.1.36--40 Rūpaappaccupalakkhaṇādisuttapañcaka
Vacchagottasaṃyutta
Vacchagottavagga
Rūpaappaccupalakkhaṇādisuttapañcaka
642--646.
1265Sāvatthinidānaṃ. “Rūpe kho, vaccha, appaccupalakkhaṇā…pe…  viññāṇe kho, vaccha, appaccupalakkhaṇā…pe… . Cattālīsamaṃ.
